name: Pipe Push Paradise (itch)
description:
A difficult open world puzzle game about plumbing. You've arrived on a lonely island faced with a hero's calling. Rise to the occasion (push pipes around) and restore this paradise to its former glory.
Available now for PC, OSX & Linux

"Infuriating" - PC Gamer

Features:
  • Pipes
  • Tile-based gameplay
  • 47 elegant puzzles packed with surprising mechanical twists
  • Lush and relaxing art & music by Teodoro Zamudio
  • Full controller support
  • Includes Steam key

pipepushparadise.com
